experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Worked as part of the Asset and Investment Management (AIM) team which focuses on building buy-side solutions. Developed a Full-Stack Project using C++, Python, Typescript, Redis, Kafka, and Bloomberg Proprietary UI & MVC framework, that provides information on available room/limit in a particular portfolio for particular security before a Compliance rule is violated.

projects.title: Image Captioning Using Attention Model
projects.subtitle: Deep Learning / Computer Vision
projects.description: Implemented an Image Captioning Model using Attention Model, using two CNN architectures to achieve encoding of the image (ResNet50 and ResNext101) and finally ensembling the attention weights of the pixels to generate captions. A BLEU Score of 0.301 was achieved. Training was done on MSCOCO '14 Dataset.

projects.title: Brain Segmentation
projects.subtitle: Full-Stack Machine Learning
projects.description: Worked on segmentation of regions of brain on MRBrains18 dataset which contains 8 label classes, in Smart India Hackathon 2019. Achieved an average dice score of 0.79 on validation set.

projects.title: Wheel Chair for Paralyzed
projects.subtitle: Deep Learning / Computer Vision
projects.description: Implemented this project using dlib, opencv, CNNs and arduino. Main idea lies in controlling a wheel chair based on lip movement to overcome the costly wheel-chairs in market. Project was made in 8 hours in a minihackathon and the dataset was generated and labeled manually.

projects.title: Facial Emotion Detection Using Autoencoder
projects.subtitle: Deep Learning / Computer Vision
projects.description: Implemented the classifier by training 7 different shallow auto-encoders for each emotion of human face using JAFFE dataset. Classification was made on the basis of least cosine distance of the output of different encoders with the flattened vector of the original image. Mentor: Dr. Chiranjeev Kumar

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.subtitle: Game
projects.description: Implemented a basic snake game using pygame library of python. Using pre-defined data structures of python, developed an algorithm to track the pixels of the snake's body which moves in the 4 direction based on the player's interaction.
